mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.mem_email AS mem_email_A , A.mem_photo , A.mem_nick , B.mem_email AS mem_email_B , B.b_file, B.b_content , B.b_rep, B.b_likes , B.b_datetime , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.b_datetime DESC) AS RN FROM t_member A JOIN t_board B ON A.mem_email = B.mem_email ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{s_paging_num} AND #{e_paging_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( b_seq, b_title , b_content , b_tag , b_loc , lat , lng , mem_email , b_file , lm_seq ) VALUES ( t_board_SEQ.nextval, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_tag}, #{b_loc}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{mem_email}, #{b_file}, #{lm_seq} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.mem_photo, A.mem_nick, A.mem_joindate, A.mem_Introduce, B.b_file, B.b_seq FROM t_member A LEFT JOIN t_board B ON A.mem_email = B.mem_email WHERE A.mem_email = #{mem_email}

SELECT ROWNUM AS rank, A.mem_email, A.authcount, B.mem_photo FROM ( SELECT M.mem_email, COUNT(*) AS authcount FROM t_board B INNER JOIN t_member M ON B.mem_email = M.mem_email GROUP BY M.mem_email ORDER BY authcount DESC ) A INNER JOIN t_member B ON A.mem_email = B.mem_email WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
